libraries.name: Kumulos
libraries.comment: Kumulos provides tools to build and host backend storage for apps, send push notifications, view audience and behavior analytics, and report on adoption, engagement and performance.

libraries.name: Pusher Beams
libraries.comment: Beams is an API for sending push notifications to iOS, Android and Web applications.

libraries.name: OneSignal
libraries.comment: OneSignal is the fastest and most reliable service to send push notifications, in-app messages, and emails to your users on mobile and web, including content management platforms like Wordpress and Shopify.

libraries.name: Taplytics
libraries.comment: Taplytics The All-In-One Product Growth Platform.

libraries.name: Leanplum
libraries.comment: Maximize customer engagement by building lasting and valuable relationships through optimized multi-channel messaging and campaign orchestration.

libraries.name: Pushwoosh
libraries.comment: Boost user engagement and revenue with new digital marketing strategies employing push notifications, in-app messages, and more.

libraries.name: IBM Cloud Push Notifications
libraries.comment: The IBM Cloud Push Notifications service provides a unified push service to send real-time notifications to mobile devices. The Push Notifications Android SDK enables Android apps to receive the sent push notifications.

libraries.name: Jiguang-jpush
libraries.comment: JPush is a tried and tested large-scale App push platform, pushing tens of billions of messages every day. After the developer integrates the SDK, he can push messages by calling the API.

libraries.name: Getui
libraries.comment: Getui Android SDK provides a safe and stable push service module for Android applications. Developers only need to perform simple configuration and coding in the original App to quickly obtain real-time and stable message push capabilities.

libraries.name: Jiguang-core
libraries.comment: JPush is a tried and tested large-scale App push platform, pushing tens of billions of messages every day. After the developer integrates the SDK, he can push messages by calling the API.
